name: tick-coordination
summary: Multi-agent task coordination using Git-backed Markdown files
description: Coordinate work across human and AI agents using the Tick protocol. Maintain structured task tracking in TICK.md files while enabling natural conversation. Supports CLI and MCP server for programmatic access.
author: Purple Horizons

examples.title: Create and claim a task
examples.code:
tick add "Build user login" --priority high --tags auth,frontend
tick agent register @bot --type bot --roles engineer
tick claim TASK-001 @bot
